definition: in the third place, coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position, the fielding position of the player on a baseball team who is stationed near the third of the bases in the infield, counting counterclockwise from home plate
details:
adverb
- in the third place
= example: in the third place
= synonyms: thirdly
adjective
- coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position
= synonyms: tertiary
noun
- the fielding position of the player on a baseball team who is stationed near the third of the bases in the infield, counting counterclockwise from home plate
= example: the fielding position of the player on a baseball team who is stationed near the third of the bases in the infield, counting counterclockwise from home plate
= synonyms: third base
- the base that must be touched third by a base runner in baseball
= example: the base that must be touched third by a base runner in baseball
= synonyms: third base
- the third from the lowest forward ratio gear in the gear box of a motor vehicle
= example: the third from the lowest forward ratio gear in the gear box of a motor vehicle
- the musical interval between one note and another three notes away from it
= example: the musical interval between one note and another three notes away from it
- one of three equal parts of a divisible whole
= example: one of three equal parts of a divisible whole
= synonyms: one-third, tierce
- following the second position in an ordering or series
= example: following the second position in an ordering or series
